title:
Beyond
the
Known

post.title: January 3
post.body:
Why would you sit at the feet of the master? Your feet are just as holy as his.

If the master is not willing to sit at your feet, please use them to quickly walk away.

post.title: January 2
post.body:
You already have the strength to fully sit with what is.

You are born encompassing all that is.

Allow this freedom to live as it will.

post.title: January 1
post.body:
Take this, the first day of the year, and resolve to live fully.

Begin with gratitude for all living creatures.

Begin, not to teach, but to learn.

Understand humanity is not us and them, but only us.

There is only One, and nothing else.

post.title: 🙚 January 🙘
post.body: ![Month of January](data/img/january.jpg "Month of January")

post.title: December 31
post.body: How have you lived your life during the last 365 days?

post.title: December 30
post.body: We sit to see, not to change.

post.title: December 29
post.body:
See this for yourself, and do not take my word for it.

Go there and find out, and you will never again ask how to live your life.

post.title: December 28
post.body:
The ego is built from what has come before.

This is clear, and easy to see.

post.title: December 27
post.body:
It is the greatest difficulty one might come up against…

…how to see.

post.title: December 26
post.body:
Can memory tell us anything about the present moment?

Or can it only be held in front of reality as a filter?

post.title: December 25
post.body: You’ll come to the end on your own soon enough.

post.title: December 24
post.body: All of the teaching you could ever hope for is there, hidden within your words.

post.title: December 23
post.body: The I is no different from what it wishes to be free from.

post.title: December 22
post.body: If one discounts their own answers, the gurus become meaningless.

post.title: December 21
post.body: The believer is full of conclusions, and empty of curiosity.

post.title: December 20
post.body:
Seeing what you are, how you truly behave…

…and sitting with no condemnation, or no lust toward changing…

…that alone may be enough to thrust you beyond the veil.

post.title: December 19
post.body:
There is no moment to be in. But what can you do?

Wait for the next moment in order to find out?

;)

post.title: December 18
post.body: There are no degrees of compassion or love, as measurement occurs within memory and thought.

post.title: December 17
post.body:
The self might need to know or need to be, but it can never grasp compassion and own it like a possession.

It is not something cultivated, and it cannot be held, stored away, and pulled out for later use.

post.title: December 16
post.body:
When one is awake, when reality realizes itself, every action is taken without fragmentation.

It is through that wholeness that compassion is expressed.

post.title: December 15
post.body: There is no motive or anything that might view the experience of pain as being important.

post.title: December 14
post.body: Where is the person doing all this moving and attaining all of this bliss?

post.title: December 13
post.body: The only level is wherever you are.

post.title: December 12
post.body: There can only be what is, and nothing more.

post.title: December 11
post.body: Only here for an instant, fully expressing itself, and never to be seen again in the same way.

post.title: December 10
post.body: If one is _All One_, there is only connection; not I am connected.

post.title: December 9
post.body:
Just look. See what is there within you; it is within us all.

It is already right there, as plain as the nose on your face.

post.title: December 8
post.body:
You are on the edge now.

The edge of the beautiful and the taxing; the free being and the image tightly held in bondage.

Only you can move into this freedom that is already present.

You may listen to others, but in the end you will find it was a movement completed on your own.

post.title: December 7
post.body:
Awareness is the movement of sitting with what is, even if you are standing.

It is something that moves as you move.

post.title: December 6
post.body:
In the physical world, if we move toward a door, there is time involved to get from here to there.

But inwardly, can any movement be made?

Is there time at all?

post.title: December 5
post.body: Sometimes writing things down can take weight off of the mind.

post.title: December 4
post.body:
Don't Mistake the Finger Pointing at the Moon for the Moon.

Forget the moon; there is no finger!

post.title: December 3
post.body:
Look up into the sky every once in awhile.

Realize your life is more than the objects situated around your physical body.

post.title: December 2
post.body:
You will never be free someday. It will never happen.

You can only be free now, in every possible moment.

Now does not include someday.

post.title: December 1
post.body:
Are you able — after a lifetime of following — to take even a single step on your own?

Take that step, and you'll find out.

post.title: 🙚 December 🙘
post.body: ![Month of December](data/img/december.jpg "Month of December")

post.title: November 30
post.body:
We do not sit in order to become; we sit in order to see.

Not what we want to see, and not to get the right answer, whatever the hell that might be, but simply to see.

post.title: November 29
post.body:
Don’t look to others to tell you what to do.

End this now.

post.title: November 28
post.body:
Go into the darkest cave for yourself.

You may find, in the deepest recesses, there is far more light than you ever thought possible.

post.title: November 27
post.body: The endless chattering of the mind, and our belief in that mind, is self-terrorism.

post.title: November 26
post.body: Liberation is out of your hands.

post.title: November 25
post.body: …you'll never have a question of how to see…

post.title: November 24
post.body:
This silence; although we may say the appearance seems to change over time; the completeness of the thing is always there in its entirety.

It is a continual evolution without growth.

post.title: November 23
post.body:
The answer to your question is fluid and alive, and coming to a fixed conclusion will only bring more frustration.

Can you see the answer without your conclusion?

post.title: November 22
post.body:
If the guru speaks in a way that is contrary to the seeker’s belief (or answer), then he is crazy.

But if the guru matches the answer already held, the seeker becomes the follower.

post.title: November 21
post.body: Do you chase what you are after in order to keep it forever as a new system of belief?

post.title: November 20
post.body:
We can use words to simply indicate the person, or to make things a bit more clear.

But there is never a reason to believe in these words.

post.title: November 19
post.body:
Growth within the self is limited to the desires, prejudices, and beliefs therein.

Is there time involved – becoming, getting better, and all of that – outside of the self?

post.title: November 18
post.body: All of these happenings within the fragmented mind are fantasies.

post.title: November 17
post.body: Everything the self encompasses is old and used.

post.title: November 16
post.body: Can a separate being, one that is divided, express compassion?

post.title: November 15
post.body:
What happens when we simply learn to be?

What are you doing right now? As you read these words, what is it that you are doing?

That is what happens.

post.title: November 14
post.body:
Is there such a thing as an enlightened person?

Have you ever asked this question?

post.title: November 13
post.body:
Others may never understand you. They might not even try.

But that is OK.

You can have enough understanding for everyone.

post.title: November 12
post.body:
The idea of something better than what is, is destructive.

You are here, but you think you should be over there.

Why?

post.title: November 11
post.body:
Oneness? Wholeness? Liberation?

These words are not important.

post.title: November 10
post.body:
The individual feels connection based on its sphere of experience and desire.

A connection to itself.

Is connection to oneself connection?

post.title: November 9
post.body:
We substitute our moment-by-moment awareness for the search.

But the object of the search is the moment-by-moment awareness.

It is the thing that we already possess.

post.title: November 8
post.body:
It may seem like a high goal; to be aware, liberated, enlightened or whatever.

But you attack life as it is, and separate it into the menial and the meaningful.

It is a movement of violence.

post.title: November 7
post.body:
If you have thoughts that are mean, selfish, and so on, those are your greatest teachers.

It is the perfect opportunity to see what is happening within, without resorting to theorizing.

In that moment you can go deeper and deeper, sinking into the reality of how your mind is functioning.

It is extremely beautiful to behold.

post.title: November 6
post.body:
This bliss, this divinity, this whatever it is, is outside all imaginings of thought.

It is completely new and reborn.

It is simultaneous birth and death, construction and destruction, start and finish.

post.title: November 5
post.body:
Liberation is not about being submissive.

It is not a matter of just taking whatever comes your way.

Liberation is seeing things as they truly are.

post.title: November 4
post.body:
You cannot exorcise the ghost residing in your mind.

You are that very ghost.

post.title: November 3
post.body:
A natural state is just that: natural.

It has nothing to do with making the right decisions.

post.title: November 2
post.body:
Don't try to be free. Don't hope to be free.

Don't want to be free. Don't even think you can or cannot be free.

Be free.

post.title: November 1
post.body:
True liberation is at the end.

The end is the beginning.

post.title: 🙚 November 🙘
post.body: ![Month of November](data/img/november.jpg "Month of November")

post.title: October 31
post.body:
All of these things – whatever feelings or thoughts you might have, good or bad – are your greatest teachings.

You must begin with what you have, and not with what you think is better.

post.title: October 30
post.body:
The doer:

A person that believes they can somehow control or wrangle Truth.

An image living within an image.

post.title: October 29
post.body:
If war has ended within you, your actions become clear.

Everywhere you move, peace moves with you.

post.title: October 28
post.body: If there is surrender, it will happen despite everything you’ve done to make it happen.

post.title: October 27
post.body:
The monument of the self.

Such an impressive, yet precarious, structure of thought.

How do you see it?

post.title: October 26
post.body:
Sit with it all and see where it goes.

But don’t expect to watch a specific event or occurrence.

Watch whatever happens to be there.

post.title: October 25
post.body: There is no interpretation to gain from.

post.title: October 24
post.body:
It is a gentle reduction of the unnecessary.

Do not try to force anything.

post.title: October 23
post.body:
There are no higher or lower states.

There is only the state you are in.

post.title: October 22
post.body:
Many people say this or that is useless or meaningless only because someone told them so.

But how useful or meaningful is that?

post.title: October 21
post.body: Non-essentials fall away to reveal the necessities.

post.title: October 20
post.body: You have no problems.

post.title: October 19
post.body: Forget hurricanes, tornadoes, or tsunami; you are the most destructive force in this world.

post.title: October 18
post.body:
Is love a paradigm? Is love based on patterns of thought?

Some say yes.

But is that all love is?

post.title: Ocober 17
post.body: Stop accepting or rejecting and just look.

post.title: October 16
post.body: Is there hope for anyone outside of your belief system?

post.title: October 15
post.body: You cannot get what you already have.

post.title: October 14
post.body: Go deep and see if anything is really there.

post.title: October 13
post.body:
It is as natural as breathing.

It is life.

post.title: October 12
post.body: Is there a better, more grand experience, or is there just experience?

post.title: October 11
post.body:
Smile as you enter every room, and leave when your presence is no longer needed.

If asked, help anyone you can.

Help them find their own worth, so that they might do the same for others.

post.title: October 10
post.body: The individual can only feel connection to those things important to its continuity.

post.title: October 9
post.body:
We move from place to place, wanting to find the Truth.

When we cannot find it with guru A, system B, or religion C, we move on to the next target.

We are victims of the search.

post.title: October 8
post.body:
Let’s be kind to thought. It is an innocent victim.

If it weren’t for your ability to think, you would never have gone down this road in the first place.

post.title: October 7
post.body: There are no thoughts to avoid, only thoughts to witness.

post.title: October 6
post.body:
See all things as they arise within you.

See it for yourself.

post.title: October 5
post.body:
Some of us enter relationships in order to avoid, or smother, our own loneliness.

Motivated by the fear of being alone.

There is no desire to relate, only silence the pain.

post.title: October 4
post.body:
Appreciate the gurus and old masters, but do not depend on them to set you free.

Your burdens are heavy enough without the added weight of their words.

post.title: October 3
post.body: Liberation is not a matter of more knowledge.

post.title: October 2
post.body:
Be careful if you say you are All One. Are you using it as a foolproof path to selfishness?

It is not just a means for you to do whatever suits a particular greed or desire.

All One is completely free of that.

post.title: October 1
post.body:
Liberation is a mysterious stranger.

You'll never know anything about her from a distance.

Cross the street to meet her, and take a closer look.

post.title: 🙚 October 🙘
post.body: ![Month of October](data/img/october.jpg "Month of October")

post.title: September 30
post.body: Permanence has no truth.

post.title: September 29
post.body:
We have created all of this suffering that has gone on in the world.

The death, the struggle, the horror, is all the result of what we believe.

post.title: September 28
post.body: Do not assume there is a something to surrender, or if there is even one capable of surrender.

post.title: September 27
post.body:
Any conclusion you reach will be made through belief or knowledge.

So where does that put you?

post.title: September 26
post.body:
We think we can have everything by having everything.

We must question this.

post.title: September 25
post.body:
In finding out, there is no expectation of what is supposed to be.

There is just honest, passionate curiosity.

post.title: September 24
post.body:
If you sit within your own conclusions, you no longer want to find the real.

You only wish to see what you already believe to be true.

post.title: September 23
post.body: Are you, the separator, in some way different from what is being separated?

post.title: September 22
post.body: Is it possible to have a non-dual concept?

post.title: September 21
post.body:
Things seem to change from time to time.

You may even find yourself letting go of things you may have once felt necessary.

But has anything really changed?

post.title: September 20
post.body: Can anything truly be called our own?

post.title: September 19
post.body:
As a human being; a brilliantly vibrant living being; you are beautiful, whole, and complete.

Never let anyone convince you otherwise.

post.title: September 18
post.body:
Is compassion a concept?

If I have a concept – a generic idea – can that in any way touch this fullness of life?

post.title: September 17
post.body:
There are, of course, thoughts.

But none of them are yours.

post.title: September 16
post.body: One might believe that one is compassionate, but what does belief have to do with compassion?

post.title: September 15
post.body: The search automatically brings in the notion that there is something missing.

post.title: September 14
post.body: If one is serious, they take it to the very end, not relying on knowledge to answer for them.

post.title: September 13
post.body:
You sit on a rock next to a tree and a person walks by.

Your physical eyes look at the person.

What is there?

Find out, my friend.

post.title: September 12
post.body: What is being sought, and who is doing the seeking?

post.title: September 11
post.body: Are you interested in enlightenment, or what you can get from it?

post.title: September 10
post.body: We look outward for the missing element, instead of seeing that it was always here.

post.title: September 9
post.body:
Awareness comes in like a truck through the wall, and it obliterates everything in its path.

That wave washes over everything and all is one.

post.title: September 8
post.body:
Liberation is beyond the normal capabilities of thought.

It is not dependent upon knowledge, or what has come before.

It is a freshness that permeates throughout everything and touches all.

post.title: September 7
post.body: All of the thoughts you hate will set you free.

post.title: September 6
post.body: Liberation is freedom in every direction.

post.title: September 5
post.body: Are you really interested in relationship, or are you simply trying to placate loneliness or some other feeling?

post.title: September 4
post.body: Is the self capable of love?

post.title: September 3
post.body:
It is not that we have forgotten compassion…

…we just spend all of our time wishing things were different from what they actually are.

post.title: September 2
post.body: If you seek it, you will never find it.

post.title: September 1
post.body:
This freedom is not a simple matter of letting go.

Who is this entity hoping to free itself?

post.title: 🙚 September 🙘
post.body: ![Month of September](data/img/september.jpg "Month of September")

post.title: August 31
post.body:
The only state you have, is the one you are in.

To sit with what is present and work from there, is all one can really do.

post.title: August 30
post.body:
Do not expect anyone to do this for you.

They cannot.

post.title: August 29
post.body: Do not be angry and look outward; be anger and look inward.

post.title: August 28
post.body:
Liberation will arrive when it arrives.

It is your job to get out of the way when it happens.

post.title: August 27
post.body: Holding violence in the mind is one of the most destructive things we do to our bodies.

post.title: August 26
post.body:
Curiosity implies you really want to find out what is within, not find what you already believe to be there.

One is full of life, the other is dead.

post.title: August 25
post.body: If there is an answer to your suffering, it is to become very serious about your life and find out what is there.

post.title: August 24
post.body:
Is liberation achieved through action?

If you say yes, how do you know it to be true? Is it due to what others have told you?

post.title: August 23
post.body: In order to see things as they arise within us, we cannot resist or condemn.

post.title: August 22
post.body:
There may be harsh words thrown around, but why do they hurt us?

Who is the victim being threatened or humiliated?

post.title: August 21
post.body:
The searcher feels the need to create something better, while simultaneously pushing the bad away.

It never works.

post.title: August 20
post.body: There may be a mind that perceives, but it is not yours at all.

post.title: August 19
post.body:
Start with you.

Your own words. Your own thoughts.

It is all right there for you to see.

post.title: August 18
post.body: Questioning is not a reaction based on belief.

post.title: August 17
post.body:
Compassion is natural.

Why is it you need to be taught anything about it?

post.title: August 16
post.body: Is the self in any way capable of sensitivity?

post.title: August 15
post.body: Can you cast aside everything and see belief for what it is?

post.title: August 14
post.body:
A word is just a sound.

And this sound, if it is to be interpreted, needs an interpreter.

post.title: August 13
post.body: There is nothing seen, and no one is seeing it.

post.title: August 12
post.body:
Consciousness contains the memories, experiences, thoughts, and other mental constructs of the mind.

What else is there?

post.title: August 11
post.body:
If you must live in a world of thought, at least go about it in a way that is pleasant for everyone.

Live in a way that is beneficial for all human beings.

post.title: August 10
post.body: The individual is limited by the walls of its own design.

post.title: August 9
post.body:
Without attachment, thoughts are seen as a beautiful movement.

The ebb and flow of thought is wonderful to behold.

post.title: August 8
post.body:
If thought were truly aware of itself, it would only be aware within its own limited field.

It can only relate to itself through what it already knows.

Nothing new springs forth.

post.title: August 7
post.body: Meditation never ends. The cushion is not necessary.

post.title: August 6
post.body: If you say you are there, if you know you are there, if you believe you are there, you are lost.

post.title: August 5
post.body:
Your idea of a person freezes out any chance of seeing them as they actually are.

You’ll only see your image of the person, and never the real thing.

post.title: August 4
post.body: Violence is not the nature of man; it is the nature of thought.

post.title: August 3
post.body:
Everything is new at every moment.

Memory stays put, arising only when necessary.

post.title: August 2
post.body:
Please slow down.

Take a deep breath.

Repeat.

post.title: August 1
post.body: All of your effort to be free strengthens the shackles of confinement.

post.title: 🙚 August 🙘
post.body: ![Month of August](data/img/august.jpg "Month of August")

post.title: July 31
post.body:
One would not ‘let go’ unless they felt something was wrong in the first place.

But there is absolutely nothing wrong with you.

You lack nothing.

post.title: July 30
post.body:
The self perceives the outer world as separate; something that is over there while I am over here.

But what is really happening?

post.title: July 29
post.body: How can anyone be angry at a sound?

post.title: July 28
post.body:
If there is a path, it will be one of your own exploration, devoid of all interference apart from your own activity.

In that place, there is every possibility, and it is not limited by what you accept or believe to be true.

post.title: July 27
post.body:
Anger helps to solidify the self.

You never feel more real than when you are angry.

It weighs heavy in the mind.

post.title: July 26
post.body: You see the search as futile, but at the same time, you think you need it in order to gain something.

post.title: July 25
post.body:
Find out now.

Everything is at stake.

post.title: July 24
post.body: Question your own statements.

post.title: July 23
post.body:
If someone is hateful to you, or if you have been insulted, you may feel some kind of pain.

But who is being hurt?

post.title: July 22
post.body:
There are no other people. No one to bring you hurt, no one to leave a scar.

If one hurts you with a word, where does it leave its mark?

post.title: July 21
post.body: You see the fact, ugly or not, and that is the truth that sets one free, not looking for something better.

post.title: July 20
post.body: When belief rises to answer the question, question the belief that rises.

post.title: July 19
post.body:
You must see with your own eyes.

It is the only way.

post.title: July 18
post.body: It takes some strength for the self to come up against what it believes to be true.

post.title: July 17
post.body:
When compassion seethes through every pore on your body, the idea of being compassionate will escape you.

You will move, and compassion will be there.

And that is all.

post.title: July 16
post.body: If one’s mind is separate, broken, and incapable of operating clearly, can that mind know what it means to be compassionate?

post.title: July 15
post.body:
It is fulfilling and meaningful to see the person; to be there with them as being unfolds.

It is a moment frozen in time, as the past falls away.

But due to the nature of being, there is no moment to be frozen.

It can only exist as a monument in our memories.

post.title: July 14
post.body: Why do you place such value on your perceptions?

post.title: July 13
post.body:
Contemplation means, the act of looking.

But when the self looks, it does not actually see; it only interprets from what it already knows.

post.title: July 12
post.body:
If a cat comes into the room and you see it, you might say that you are aware of the cat.

But what happens if the cat is seen, but there is no one there to be aware of anything?

post.title: July 11
post.body:
There is no possible way to know enlightenment.

Once thought has solidified something in order to better control and understand it, the thing is dead.

post.title: July 10
post.body: We disconnect from oneness, thinking we will have security, only to want to go back to nothingness because there is no security.

post.title: July 9
post.body:
The energy of liberation is massive. It bursts through the room and reaches out into infinity.

As one sits in the chair, aliveness seems to pulse, like a metronome that counts in waves, not in beats.

This energy engulfs all. It is the purest essence of life.

post.title: July 8
post.body:
It is an awareness of the whole movement of thought.

This is an altogether different kind of functioning.

post.title: July 7
post.body:
When you sit in order to see, you must go slowly.

Don’t instantly fall back on what you already know and have memorized.

Leave space for the meaning to become apparent without your effort.

post.title: July 6
post.body:
The question you might want to explore:

“Is it possible to be completely present with every single human being I come into contact with?”

Find out.

post.title: July 5
post.body:
You might think you can only have a relationship with someone you know…

…someone known to you through your memories of them.

If that is how you perceive things, it is quite possible that you have never related with anything.

post.title: July 4
post.body:
You are nature.

And naturalness is the nature of nature.

post.title: July 3
post.body:
One must be truly alone to discover whatever lies inside.

One must set everything aside, for perhaps the very first time, and travel alone.

post.title: July 2
post.body:
You will live until you die.

The beginning and ending is certain.

But what will you do with the long middle act?

post.title: July 1
post.body:
When sitting with nature, do not look for answers.

Look with nature and share in all of these parallel movements.

post.title: 🙚 July 🙘
post.body: ![Month of July](data/img/july.jpg "Month of July")

post.title: June 30
post.body:
None of us knows what will happen.

One can only sit with oneself and see how it all unfurls.

post.title: June 29
post.body:
It is a very clean and clear movement bringing peace in its wake.

There is no evil that can stand against it.

post.title: June 28
post.body: To even approach this will require all of your attention and energy.

post.title: June 27
post.body:
If someone insults you, and you become angry, do you ever ask Why am I angry?

It is such a simple question, but no one ever asks.

post.title: June 26
post.body:
You have seen it clearly.

Now what do you do?

post.title: June 25
post.body: Taking a single step is going too far.

post.title: June 24
post.body: Be prepared to take it to the end. Do not be too timid in your explorations.

post.title: June 23
post.body: No one can give it to you.

post.title: June 22
post.body: Words will always be imperfect, but we do the best we can with what we have.

post.title: June 21
post.body: The room stays the same, no matter how colorful the new curtains are.

post.title: June 20
post.body:
Don't move!

It is there, right in front of you.

post.title: June 19
post.body: There is no NOW.

post.title: June 18
post.body:
Too much energy is spent on resisting or countering everything that comes into view.

No amount of pushing will ever clear one’s mind or ease one’s suffering.

post.title: June 17
post.body:
You…

…are not.

post.title: June 16
post.body:
Self-Development.

LOL…

post.title: June 15
post.body:
Be.

There is nothing else.

post.title: June 14
post.body: Sit with whatever it happens to be.

post.title: June 13
post.body: What is it that contemplates?

post.title: June 12
post.body: If you think you know it, you are mistaken.

post.title: June 11
post.body:
Enlightenment – if we can use that word – is beyond thought.

It is alive-ness that is beyond what we have known.

post.title: June 10
post.body: Nothing more and nothing less.

post.title: June 9
post.body:
It may seem blinding or frenetic or smoggy, but it is the height of love and beauty.

It is all there for you, but it is not necessarily happening to you.

post.title: June 8
post.body:
Stay with the seeing, and not with the believing.

It is this open-ness that brings the energy to the fore; the seeming eternal energy that spreads like a flame throughout humanity.

post.title: June 7
post.body:
Liberation is not really a loss of belief, but a loss of the believer.

It is the loss of everything.

post.title: June 6
post.body: Relationship is a constant, moving, living thing.

post.title: June 5
post.body: If you think relationship differs from person to person, then what you describe is not relationship, but your own prejudice and preference based on memory.

post.title: June 4
post.body:
Can't you just look at the tree?

Don't worry over this word is not the thing nonsense. Just look.

Embrace its beauty.

post.title: June 3
post.body: Whatever you think of liberation — how to get, how to acquire — is irrelevant, and will only keep you from expressing whatever is naturally within you.

post.title: June 2
post.body:
The seeds of peace are within you.

You do not have to be a farmer to nurture those seeds, or to cultivate a life to unimaginable heights.

post.title: June 1
post.body:
The lessons of Nature are constantly available, forever playing out in front of you.

Only for you.

post.title: 🙚 June 🙘
post.body: ![Month of June](data/img/june.jpg "Month of June")

post.title: May 31
post.body:
Freedom, liberation, truth, is really the most fragile thing.

It can be destroyed with a word, an image, an idea.

post.title: May 30
post.body:
Perhaps aggressive acts will come to an end because humanity will finally see the danger and act accordingly.

Perhaps aggressive acts will come to an end due to the extinction of humanity.

Does one seem more likely than the other?

post.title: May 29
post.body:
There is no world crisis, meaning, out of your hands. It is your crisis.

It is not your fault, but it is your responsibility.

post.title: May 28
post.body:
One can only pity the self.

All the activity it undertakes in order to find something it can never know.

post.title: May 27
post.body:
Stop.

Take your time.

Breathe…

post.title: May 26
post.body: Effort is separation.

post.title: May 25
post.body:
The searcher might get caught up in what they think is there, or what they think might happen.

But these very ideas of what may or may not be, solidify the problem even more.

post.title: May 24
post.body:
You have seen this clearly.

With every perception, you become the greatest teacher you’ll ever need.

post.title: May 23
post.body:
If there is an age of enlightenment, it is now. It has always been now.

It is within every moment of every second, in every petal of every flower, and it is inescapable.

post.title: May 22
post.body: Experience is a solidified and unchanging state, born from a unique and ever changing moment.

post.title: May 21
post.body: If you want to investigate, begin with your own beliefs.

post.title: May 20
post.body:
The should be is not a fact; the wanting to be is.

All of this begins with what we have, as painful as it may be.

post.title: May 19
post.body:
All that you are searching for is hidden within your own being.

You are your own greatest guru.

post.title: May 18
post.body:
It is life, as it is lived.

It is not anything more or less than that.

post.title: May 17
post.body: Compassion is expressed when the idea of being compassionate is dropped.

post.title: May 16
post.body: Every movement in liberation becomes an expression of compassion and love.

post.title: May 15
post.body: How do you know what an enlightened person is supposed to look like?

post.title: May 14
post.body: When our objections arise, it is the perfect moment to see how we, the identity of self, operate; how we may react to things we believe or disbelieve.

post.title: May 13
post.body: When the self is in action, it is a movement of the past.

post.title: May 12
post.body: As there is no self to define, definitions are useless.

post.title: May 11
post.body: Understanding is never enough.

post.title: May 10
post.body: All the time you are becoming, you are never being.

post.title: May 9
post.body:
Nature can only be.

You are nature.

post.title: May 8
post.body:
There may be pride in knowing liberation. There may even be the need to tell everyone what you now believe.

But is the stillness there? Or did the monkey simply take the train down a different track?

post.title: May 7
post.body:
If you are full of beliefs, there is nothing wrong with that.

But if you want to deeply inquire within, be prepared to lose everything.

post.title: May 6
post.body:
Sit with yourself, with no expectation of what you will get or how long it will take.

Do it for the sake of the doing, and nothing else.

post.title: May 5
post.body:
Can one make love happen?

Is it something we have some control over, or is making love happen the same as making breathing happen?

post.title: May 4
post.body:
Be considerate, but please don't worry too much about being on time.

You'll be dead soon, in the scheme of things, and I am fairly certain your final thoughts will not linger over someone's anger at your tardiness.

post.title: May 3
post.body: Learn deeply the lives of those you love. It is a lesson beyond measure.

post.title: May 2
post.body:
How many pages, in the book of your life, have been written by others?

Most of them? All of them?

What is it you hope to achieve by editing the words of others?

post.title: May 1
post.body:
You will lose everything you hold dear.

But that is quite all right; you have nothing to begin with.

post.title: 🙚 May 🙘
post.body: ![Month of May](data/img/may.jpg "Month of May")

post.title: April 30
post.body: Using words, all one can do is approach the essence.

post.title: April 29
post.body:
The only mystery is the one you have created.

Outside of your ideas, where does it exist?

post.title: April 28
post.body: Never once can there be the knowledge of what is not, and if there is a knowing of the not, it is not the not.

post.title: April 27
post.body:
Sit down with one of your closest friends.

How do you see them? Can you see without your memories?

post.title: April 26
post.body: Is the I trapped, or is the I the trap?

post.title: April 25
post.body:
Cast out all of it and begin where you are.

You do not need anyone to tell you what is there.

post.title: April 24
post.body: The problem is your story of liberation; the idea of what is there and how joyful you will be once you achieve it.

post.title: April 23
post.body: Instead of a frightened, uncertain, violent caveman with a pointy stick, we have a frightened, uncertain, violent caveman with gun and a home theater system.

post.title: April 22
post.body:
Another person might explain liberation, or how it will unfold, beautifully.

But that doesn’t mean anything.

Even though they may very well end up being correct, it still means nothing.

post.title: April 21
post.body:
It is destruction…

…leaving nothing but dust.

post.title: April 20
post.body: The questioner is the answer.

post.title: April 19
post.body: The greatest freedom comes from what the human being can explore on its own, outside of the external powers that be.

post.title: April 18
post.body: Compassion is, where separation is not.

post.title: April 17
post.body:
Is it possible to be compassionate, or is there just compassion?

This is very important to understand on your own.

post.title: April 16
post.body: All movement in liberation is an extension of compassion.

post.title: April 15
post.body:
People think of enlightenment in terms of how it should be.

And if, after all of this time, you are still only seeing what you think should be, what is the point of it all?

Once you follow the should, you are lost.

post.title: April 14
post.body:
Preconceived ideas of right and wrong compress the organism into a dull zombified way of seeing.

It is not really seeing at all, but a dependence upon our preferences of right and wrong.

post.title: April 13
post.body: If there is a who contemplating, the who and the item of contemplation are the same.

post.title: April 12
post.body:
Everything just happens.

Nothing ever happens.

post.title: April 11
post.body:
It is true that all we need is food and shelter.

But there is no need to live in a cave or give away everything we own.

An ascetic lifestyle is just a different kind of greed.

post.title: April 10
post.body:
I go to you for the answer to enlightenment.

You tell me, Do this, do that.

I do those things, but nothing changes.

I go on and on.

post.title: April 9
post.body: If there is separation, it is due to the activity of thought, and has nothing to do with what you really are.

post.title: April 8
post.body: Liberation is beyond all of your ideas of Liberation.

post.title: April 7
post.body:
Oneness isn’t a matter of believing in non-belief.

There simply is no belief.

post.title: April 6
post.body:
Being alone has nothing to do with loneliness. And it is not about isolation.

Only the self can be isolated, and this isolation has nothing to do with one’s surroundings.

post.title: April 5
post.body: You are the only one. There are no others.

post.title: April 4
post.body:
The wind blows.

Bits of trash scrape along the street.

That is all there is.

post.title: April 3
post.body:
The world needs you.

Somewhere on this planet are men, women, children — real-life human beings — that will benefit from your presence.

Please, do not waste one more minute of time.

You will be dead soon, after all.

post.title: April 2
post.body:
If you draw a picture of yourself, make it as detailed as possible with the exception of the eyes.

Leave them out entirely.

This is a more accurate depiction of how we live our lives.

post.title: April 1
post.body: Dualism of the word enslaves you to the emptiness of thought, which is not the emptiness of being.

post.title: 🙚 April 🙘
post.body: ![Month of April](data/img/april.jpg "Month of April")

post.title: March 31
post.body:
A guru may tell us Enlightenment is all bliss, all love, all this or all that.

And all we can do is imagine that non-existent state.

Then we begin our search, looking for the state we have imagined, which is not the actual thing.

post.title: March 30
post.body: Grass bends in the wind, but not because it wants to bend.

post.title: March 29
post.body:
None of this is a mystery.

Always as it is; never as it should be.

post.title: March 28
post.body:
There is no security in the self.

There is no security in Liberation.

post.title: March 27
post.body: To relate is to be present, to be fresh, from beginning to end.

post.title: March 26
post.body: Is there a Way of Seeing that is not dependent upon the known?

post.title: March 25
post.body: This thing takes hold instantly, and there is no way to see how anything could have led to it.

post.title: March 24
post.body: You cannot flower under the boot of another.

post.title: March 23
post.body: Freedom will not come through accumulation.

post.title: March 22
post.body:
Technology allows us to be connected instantly all over the world.

Yet, we are the loneliest we have ever been.

post.title: March 21
post.body: The selfish always fall, and fall hard.

post.title: March 20
post.body: Are you able to listen?

post.title: March 19
post.body:
People want to be free from suffering.

But their favored means of attainment is personified suffering.

post.title: March 18
post.body: This is not mere understanding.

post.title: March 17
post.body: Compassion is a natural movement, not dependent upon thought.

post.title: March 16
post.body: A compassionate being is one that acts, free of the trappings of the self.

post.title: March 15
post.body: It is far better to meet in person.

post.title: March 14
post.body:
Some people call it — this process of awakening — taking out the trash.

But I have found it is not so much that trash needs to be taken out…

…Can you carry yourself to the curb?

post.title: March 13
post.body: The self is nothing more than a contrary position.

post.title: March 12
post.body:
Does wholeness require any time?

How long does it take to move from zero to zero?

post.title: March 11
post.body:
Enlightenment is the end of the line.

Nothing is gained and everything is lost.

post.title: March 10
post.body:
Could it be the only reason you go to someone for answers is not because you want to find something new, but because you want them to support the answers you already have?

Do you really want to see anything for yourself?

post.title: March 9
post.body:
You are not a mere part of nature and you are not separate from it.

You are nature.

post.title: March 8
post.body:
You can never have more or less than what you have.

That is where you start, and that is where you end.

post.title: March 7
post.body:
Opinion is based upon an idea of what you perceive.

It is a trusted, static bit of knowledge that you lean on as a crutch during active moments of experience.

post.title: March 6
post.body: This is only for you to see.

post.title: March 5
post.body: Nothing, other than the self, can hold one back in this life.

post.title: March 4
post.body:
One day, thought may collapse in on itself, destroying the secret curtain hiding the charade.

But even if it does not, you can still have a wonderful life, full of joy.

post.title: March 3
post.body:
There is no shame in doing something you love to do.

There is no reason one would drop their joy after awakening.

In fact, a greater appreciation might be revealed, as the experience and the doing become an unparalleled event.

post.title: March 2
post.body:
It is not quite right to say liberation is like a laser that cuts through all things.

There is nothing to cut.

post.title: March 1
post.body:
If you wish to see to the end of the tunnel, simply look.

Only your eyes can reveal the truth.

No one else can see this for you.

post.title: 🙚 March 🙘
post.body: ![Month of March](data/img/march.jpg "Month of March")

post.title: February 28
post.body:
You hope to surrender yourself in order to be free?

How will you surrender the person doing all of this surrendering?

post.title: February 27
post.body: Have you ever actually seen another person?

post.title: February 26
post.body: Is the self capable of seeing beyond what it knows?

post.title: February 25
post.body:
Your idea of freedom is based on ideals — or ideas of ideals — your search, your result, your despair, and so on.
None of this is freedom.

post.title: February 24
post.body:
You may say this is all aliveness, or there are various levels of consciousness, or it is all one source, I Am That, all paths lead to the same oneness, or a million other things.
But is this what you have discovered, or is it what you have been told?

post.title: February 23
post.body:
It is a playful-ness, and something that can never really be lost.
It may be covered up, but never lost.

post.title: February 22
post.body: If we use technology to solve a problem that is, essentially, a problem of the self, the results will be devastating.

post.title: February 21
post.body:
Human beings are completely dependent upon one another for survival.
This is visible everywhere in nature. Even down to the cells in your body.
It is all dependent upon relationship.

post.title: February 20
post.body: It is the job of the seeker to make these things into a system of practice, or to reject them out of their own already existent system of practice.

post.title: February 19
post.body: In all of this time, where has the search taken you?

post.title: February 18
post.body:
What is it you hope to change?
Where is it?

post.title: February 17
post.body: Compassion begins at the end.

post.title: February 16
post.body: Can the self move in any way other than to perpetuate its own continuity?

post.title: February 15
post.body:
It is not a pointing in a particular direction, and it is not a matter of seeing things the way another person sees.
It is seeing past, sifting beyond, what you already know.

post.title: February 14
post.body: There is no enlightenment. There are only ideas of enlightenment.

post.title: February 13
post.body: The self does not search. The self is the search.

post.title: February 12
post.body: Consciousness accumulates over time, and that is the pool the self draws from.

post.title: February 11
post.body: Life Beyond the Image is death.

post.title: February 10
post.body: To search is to escape.

post.title: February 9
post.body: Be the light to the world you wish to possess.

post.title: February 8
post.body: Are thoughts good or bad, or is it merely your thoughts of thought being good or bad?

post.title: February 7
post.body: Is there a point of view if there is no point to view from?

post.title: February 6
post.body:
Quiet yourself and see what is within.
Be alone.

post.title: February 5
post.body: You will never know death until you die to all you carry with you at this moment.

post.title: February 4
post.body:
Thought is a wonderful playground. Many wonderful things may happen there.
But far too many predators lurk about, so one must be careful.

post.title: February 3
post.body:
Find out now.
Every second you waste is a disservice to humanity.

post.title: February 2
post.body:
The ghost whispering in your mind will only lie to you.
But not out of maliciousness.
That is all it knows how to do.

post.title: February 1
post.body:
It is not a matter of doing. It is not even a matter of what you desire.
All of that is insignificant when faced with the reality of what you are.
It unfolds beyond all you've learned.

post.title: February
post.body: ![February](data/img/february.jpg "February")

post.title: January 31
post.body: The danger is in reaching for the idea of freedom, thinking it is in any way real.

post.title: January 30
post.body: If you believe war cannot end, you fan the flames of blood and suffering.

post.title: Januar 29
post.body:
There is the idea of a separate identity.
This becomes the center that sees; the point of false light, creating its own illusory shadows.
Its greatest strength is that it can hurt itself. And through that pain, it seems more real.
What is real about you?

post.title: January 28
post.body:
Many people stop with the idea of surrender.
“Yes, surrender is the thing that will get me what I want.”
This is the action of the doer, trying to get something to complete its wholeness.
Are you incomplete?

post.title: January 27
post.body:
No one can tell you how to see.
Not even You.

post.title: January 26
post.body: You have superimposed belief onto reality. That is the Way of Seeing for the blind.

post.title: January 25
post.body:
Perhaps you have seen no way of knowing.
Where do you move from there?
If you cannot possibly know, what does that suggest to you?

post.title: January 24
post.body: Challenge the thought arising.

post.title: January 23
post.body:
Are you a question, seeking the answer?
Or are you already the answer, seeking the right question?

post.title: January 22
post.body: It is in your nature to be the expression of complete compassion.

post.title: January 21
post.body:
You must go deeper.
See these movements in their purest form.

post.title: January 20
post.body:
The real tyrant is the ghost in the darkness.
It is not the one staring back in the mirror; it is the one thinking about the one staring back in the mirror.

post.title: January 19
post.body:
What if your spiritual journey was negated?
If you woke up tomorrow and your search was gone, if nothing were left, what would you do?

post.title: January 18
post.body:
Look at the world, as it is.
Can you see it?

post.title: January 17
post.body:
A mind that is whole is incapable of taking wrong actions.
There are no actions to take…

post.title: January 16
post.body: If the self hopes to be compassionate, is compassion there at all?

post.title: January 15
post.body:
This is your life.
Only your discoveries, free from the muddy paw prints of others, shine in the darkness.

post.title: January 14
post.body:
Is it in your mind that enlightened people should follow a certain path, dress a certain way, or talk a certain way?
Are you looking for truth, or more comfort?

post.title: January 13
post.body: Thought is the only suffering. Nothing else.

post.title: January 12
post.body:
Consciousness is the same as the content it contains.
There is no consciousness if there is no experience, no memory, no thought.

post.title: January 11
post.body: All belief is the same.

post.title: January 10
post.body:
The should be and the IS can never meet.
One is the world of thought; the other is beyond thought.

post.title: January 9
post.body:
Separation is violence.
Yet one hopes to be free of pain and suffering through separation, creating more violence.
Separation can never bring unity.

post.title: January 8
post.body:
Nature is something thought cannot touch.
Thought can create glorious structures, but it can do absolutely nothing about nature.
Only awe in its presence.

post.title: January 7
post.body:
Methods and systems are not the answer.
And that includes any method or system of your own creation.

post.title: January 6
post.body:
If you want the right person in your life because you think it will complete you, it is the wrong direction.
You are already full and complete.
Perfection is there, share it with everyone.

post.title: January 5
post.body:
No effort.
Be quiet.
Be still.

post.title: January 4
post.body:
Don't worry over consciousness. It really is not so important.
You have no consciousness.

post.title: January 3
post.body:
Why would you sit at the feet of the master? Your feet are just as holy as his.
If the master is not willing to sit at your feet, please use them to quickly walk away.

post.title: January 2
post.body:
You already have the strength to fully sit with what is.
You are born encompassing all that is.
Allow this freedom to live as it will.

post.title: January 1
post.body:
Take this, the first day of the year, and resolve to live fully.
Begin with gratitude for all living creatures.
Begin, not to teach, but to learn.
Understand humanity is not us and them, but only us.
There is only One, and nothing else.

post.title: January
post.body: ![January](data/img/january.jpg "January")

post.title: December 31
post.body: How have you lived your life during the last 365 days?

post.title: December 30
post.body: We sit to see, not to change.

post.title: December 29
post.body:
See this for yourself, and do not take my word for it.
Go there and find out, and you will never again ask how to live your life.

post.title: December 28
post.body:
The ego is built from what has come before.
This is clear, and easy to see.

post.title: December 27
post.body:
It is the greatest difficulty one might come up against…

…how to see.

post.title: December 26
post.body:
Can memory tell us anything about the present moment?
Or can it only be held in front of reality as a filter?

post.title: December 25
post.body: You’ll come to the end on your own soon enough.

post.title: December 24
post.body: All of the teaching you could ever hope for is there, hidden within your words.

post.title: December 23
post.body: The I is no different from what it wishes to be free from.

post.title: December 22
post.body: If one discounts their own answers, the gurus become meaningless.

post.title: December 21
post.body: The believer is full of conclusions, and empty of curiosity.

post.title: December 20
post.body:
Seeing what you are, how you truly behave…
…and sitting with no condemnation, or no lust toward changing…
…that alone may be enough to thrust you beyond the veil.

post.title: December 19
post.body:
There is no moment to be in. But what can you do?
Wait for the next moment in order to find out?
;)

post.title: December 18
post.body: There are no degrees of compassion or love, as measurement occurs within memory and thought.

post.title: December 17
post.body:
The self might need to know or need to be, but it can never grasp compassion and own it like a possession.
It is not something cultivated, and it cannot be held, stored away, and pulled out for later use.

post.title: December 16
post.body:
When one is awake, when reality realizes itself, every action is taken without fragmentation.
It is through that wholeness that compassion is expressed.

post.title: December 15
post.body: There is no motive or anything that might view the experience of pain as being important.

post.title: December 14
post.body: Where is the person doing all this moving and attaining all of this bliss?

post.title: December 13
post.body: The only level is wherever you are.

post.title: December 12
post.body: There can only be what is, and nothing more.

post.title: December 11
post.body: Only here for an instant, fully expressing itself, and never to be seen again in the same way.

post.title: December 10
post.body: If one is All One, there is only connection; not I am connected.

post.title: December 9
post.body:
Just look. See what is there within you; it is within us all.
It is already right there, as plain as the nose on your face.

post.title: December 8
post.body:
You are on the edge now.
The edge of the beautiful and the taxing; the free being and the image tightly held in bondage.
Only you can move into this freedom that is already present.
You may listen to others, but in the end you will find it was a movement completed on your own.

post.title: December 7
post.body:
Awareness is the movement of sitting with what is, even if you are standing.
It is something that moves as you move.

post.title: December 6
post.body:
In the physical world, if we move toward a door, there is time involved to get from here to there.
But inwardly, can any movement be made?
Is there time at all?

post.title: December 5
post.body: Sometimes writing things down can take weight off of the mind.

post.title: December 4
post.body:
Don't Mistake the Finger Pointing at the Moon for the Moon.
Forget the moon; there is no finger!

post.title: December 3
post.body:
Look up into the sky every once in awhile.
Realize your life is more than the objects situated around your physical body.

post.title: December 2
post.body:
You will never be free someday. It will never happen.
You can only be free now, in every possible moment.
Now does not include someday.

post.title: December 1
post.body:
Are you able — after a lifetime of following — to take even a single step on your own?
Take that step, and you'll find out.

post.title: December
post.body: ![December](data/img/december.jpg "December")

post.title: November 30
post.body:
We do not sit in order to become; we sit in order to see.
Not what we want to see, and not to get the right answer, whatever the hell that might be, but simply to see.

post.title: November 29
post.body:
Don’t look to others to tell you what to do.
End this now.

post.title: November 28
post.body:
Go into the darkest cave for yourself.
You may find, in the deepest recesses, there is far more light than you ever thought possible.

post.title: November 27
post.body: The endless chattering of the mind, and our belief in that mind, is self-terrorism.

post.title: November 26
post.body: Liberation is out of your hands.

post.title: November 25
post.body: …you'll never have a question of how to see…

post.title: November 24
post.body:
This silence; although we may say the appearance seems to change over time; the completeness of the thing is always there in its entirety.
It is a continual evolution without growth.

post.title: November 23
post.body:
The answer to your question is fluid and alive, and coming to a fixed conclusion will only bring more frustration.
Can you see the answer without your conclusion?

post.title: November 22
post.body:
If the guru speaks in a way that is contrary to the seeker’s belief (or answer), then he is crazy.
But if the guru matches the answer already held, the seeker becomes the follower.

post.title: November 21
post.body: Do you chase what you are after in order to keep it forever as a new system of belief?

post.title: November 20
post.body:
We can use words to simply indicate the person, or to make things a bit more clear.
But there is never a reason to believe in these words.

post.title: November 19
post.body:
Growth within the self is limited to the desires, prejudices, and beliefs therein.
Is there time involved – becoming, getting better, and all of that – outside of the self?

post.title: November 18
post.body: All of these happenings within the fragmented mind are fantasies.

post.title: November 17
post.body: Everything the self encompasses is old and used.

post.title: November 16
post.body: Can a separate being, one that is divided, express compassion?

post.title: November 15
post.body:
What happens when we simply learn to be?
What are you doing right now? As you read these words, what is it that you are doing?
That is what happens.

post.title: Nobember 14
post.body:
Is there such a thing as an enlightened person?
Have you ever asked this question?

post.title: November 13
post.body:
Others may never understand you. They might not even try.
But that is OK.
You can have enough understanding for everyone.

post.title: November 12
post.body:
The idea of something better than what is, is destructive.
You are here, but you think you should be over there.
Why?

post.title: November 11
post.body:
Oneness? Wholeness? Liberation?
These words are not important.

post.title: November 10
post.body:
The individual feels connection based on its sphere of experience and desire.
A connection to itself.
Is connection to oneself connection?

post.title: November 9
post.body:
We substitute our moment-by-moment awareness for the search.
But the object of the search is the moment-by-moment awareness.
It is the thing that we already possess.

post.title: November 8
post.body:
It may seem like a high goal; to be aware, liberated, enlightened or whatever.
But you attack life as it is, and separate it into the menial and the meaningful.
It is a movement of violence.

post.title: November 7
post.body:
If you have thoughts that are mean, selfish, and so on, those are your greatest teachers.
It is the perfect opportunity to see what is happening within, without resorting to theorizing.
In that moment you can go deeper and deeper, sinking into the reality of how your mind is functioning.
It is extremely beautiful to behold.

post.title: November 6
post.body:
This bliss, this divinity, this whatever it is, is outside all imaginings of thought.
It is completely new and reborn.
It is simultaneous birth and death, construction and destruction, start and finish.

post.title: November 5
post.body:
Liberation is not about being submissive.
It is not a matter of just taking whatever comes your way.
Liberation is seeing things as they truly are.

post.title: November 4
post.body:
You cannot exorcise the ghost residing in your mind.
You are that very ghost.

post.title: November 3
post.body:
A natural state is just that: natural.
It has nothing to do with making the right decisions.

post.title: November 2
post.body:
Don't try to be free. Don't hope to be free.
Don't want to be free. Don't even think you can or cannot be free.
Be free.

post.title: November 1
post.body:
True liberation is at the end.
The end is the beginning.

post.title: November
post.body: ![November](data/img/november.jpg "November")

post.title: October 31
post.body:
All of these things – whatever feelings or thoughts you might have, good or bad – are your greatest teachings.
You must begin with what you have, and not with what you think is better.

post.title: October 30
post.body:
The doer:
A person that believes they can somehow control or wrangle Truth.
An image living within an image.

post.title: October 29
post.body:
If war has ended within you, your actions become clear.
Everywhere you move, peace moves with you.

post.title: October 28
post.body: If there is surrender, it will happen despite everything you’ve done to make it happen.

post.title: October 27
post.body:
The monument of the self.
Such an impressive, yet precarious, structure of thought.
How do you see it?

post.title: October 26
post.body:
Sit with it all and see where it goes.
But don’t expect to watch a specific event or occurrence.
Watch whatever happens to be there.

post.title: October 25
post.body: There is no interpretation to gain from.

post.title: October 24
post.body:
It is a gentle reduction of the unnecessary.
Do not try to force anything.

post.title: October 23
post.body:
There are no higher or lower states.
There is only the state you are in.

post.title: October 22
post.body:
Many people say this or that is useless or meaningless only because someone told them so.
But how useful or meaningful is that?

post.title: October 21
post.body: Non-essentials fall away to reveal the necessities.

post.title: October 20
post.body: You have no problems.

post.title: October 19
post.body: Forget hurricanes, tornadoes, or tsunami; you are the most destructive force in this world.

post.title: October 18
post.body:
Is love a paradigm? Is love based on patterns of thought?
Some say yes.
But is that all love is?

post.title: October 17
post.body: Stop accepting or rejecting and just look.

post.title: October 16
post.body: Is there hope for anyone outside of your belief system?

post.title: October 15
post.body: You cannot get what you already have.

post.title: October 14
post.body: Go deep and see if anything is really there.

post.title: October 13
post.body:
It is as natural as breathing.
It is life.

post.title: October 12
post.body: Is there a better, more grand experience, or is there just experience?

post.title: October 11
post.body:
Smile as you enter every room, and leave when your presence is no longer needed.
If asked, help anyone you can.
Help them find their own worth, so that they might do the same for others.

post.title: October 10
post.body: The individual can only feel connection to those things important to its continuity.

post.title: October 9
post.body:
We move from place to place, wanting to find the Truth.
When we cannot find it with guru A, system B, or religion C, we move on to the next target.
We are victims of the search.

post.title: October 8
post.body:
Let’s be kind to thought. It is an innocent victim.
If it weren’t for your ability to think, you would never have gone down this road in the first place.

post.title: October 7
post.body: There are no thoughts to avoid, only thoughts to witness.

post.title: October 6
post.body:
See all things as they arise within you.
See it for yourself.

post.title: October 5
post.body:
Some of us enter relationships in order to avoid, or smother, our own loneliness.
Motivated by the fear of being alone.
There is no desire to relate, only silence the pain.

post.title: October 4
post.body:
Appreciate the gurus and old masters, but do not depend on them to set you free.
Your burdens are heavy enough without the added weight of their words.

post.title: October 3
post.body: Liberation is not a matter of more knowledge.

post.title: October 2
post.body:
Be careful if you say you are All One. Are you using it as a foolproof path to selfishness?
It is not just a means for you to do whatever suits a particular greed or desire.
All One is completely free of that.

post.title: October 1
post.body:
Liberation is a mysterious stranger.
You'll never know anything about her from a distance.
Cross the street to meet her, and take a closer look.

post.title: October
post.body: ![October](data/img/october.jpg "October")

post.title: September 30
post.body: Permanence has no truth.

post.title: September 29
post.body:
We have created all of this suffering that has gone on in the world.
The death, the struggle, the horror, is all the result of what we believe.

post.title: September 28
post.body: Do not assume there is a something to surrender, or if there is even one capable of surrender.

post.title: September 27
post.body:
Any conclusion you reach will be made through belief or knowledge.
So where does that put you?

post.title: September 26
post.body:
We think we can have everything by having everything.
We must question this.

post.title: September 25
post.body:
In finding out, there is no expectation of what is supposed to be.
There is just honest, passionate curiosity.

post.title: September 24
post.body:
If you sit within your own conclusions, you no longer want to find the real.
You only wish to see what you already believe to be true.

post.title: September 23
post.body: Are you, the separator, in some way different from what is being separated?

post.title: September 22
post.body: Is it possible to have a non-dual concept?

post.title: September 21
post.body:
Things seem to change from time to time.
You may even find yourself letting go of things you may have once felt necessary.
But has anything really changed?

post.title: September 20
post.body: Can anything truly be called our own?

post.title: September 19
post.body:
As a human being; a brilliantly vibrant living being; you are beautiful, whole, and complete.
Never let anyone convince you otherwise.

post.title: September 18
post.body:
Is compassion a concept?
If I have a concept – a generic idea – can that in any way touch this fullness of life?

post.title: September 17
post.body:
There are, of course, thoughts.
But none of them are yours.

post.title: September 16
post.body: One might believe that one is compassionate, but what does belief have to do with compassion?

post.title: September 15
post.body: The search automatically brings in the notion that there is something missing.

post.title: September 14
post.body: If one is serious, they take it to the very end, not relying on knowledge to answer for them.

post.title: September 13
post.body:
You sit on a rock next to a tree and a person walks by.
Your physical eyes look at the person.
What is there?
Find out, my friend.

post.title: September 12
post.body: What is being sought, and who is doing the seeking?

post.title: September 11
post.body: Are you interested in enlightenment, or what you can get from it?

post.title: September 10
post.body: We look outward for the missing element, instead of seeing that it was always here.

post.title: September 9
post.body:
Awareness comes in like a truck through the wall, and it obliterates everything in its path.
That wave washes over everything and all is one.

post.title: September 8
post.body:
Liberation is beyond the normal capabilities of thought.
It is not dependent upon knowledge, or what has come before.
It is a freshness that permeates throughout everything and touches all.

post.title: September 7
post.body: All of the thoughts you hate will set you free.

post.title: September 6
post.body: Liberation is freedom in every direction.

post.title: September 5
post.body: Are you really interested in relationship, or are you simply trying to placate loneliness or some other feeling?

post.title: September 4
post.body: Is the self capable of love?

post.title: September 3
post.body:
It is not that we have forgotten compassion…

…we just spend all of our time wishing things were different from what they actually are.

post.title: September 2
post.body: If you seek it, you will never find it.

post.title: September 1
post.body:
This freedom is not a simple matter of letting go.
Who is this entity hoping to free itself?

post.title: September
post.body: ![September](data/img/september.jpg "September")

post.title: August 31
post.body:
The only state you have, is the one you are in.
To sit with what is present and work from there, is all one can really do.

post.title: August 30
post.body:
Do not expect anyone to do this for you.
They cannot.

post.title: August 29
post.body: Do not be angry and look outward; be anger and look inward.

post.title: August 28
post.body:
Liberation will arrive when it arrives.
It is your job to get out of the way when it happens.

post.title: August 27
post.body: Holding violence in the mind is one of the most destructive things we do to our bodies.

post.title: August 26
post.body:
Curiosity implies you really want to find out what is within, not find what you already believe to be there.
One is full of life, the other is dead.

post.title: August 25
post.body: If there is an answer to your suffering, it is to become very serious about your life and find out what is there.

post.title: August 24
post.body:
Is liberation achieved through action?
If you say yes, how do you know it to be true? Is it due to what others have told you?

post.title: August 23
post.body: In order to see things as they arise within us, we cannot resist or condemn.

post.title: August 22
post.body:
There may be harsh words thrown around, but why do they hurt us?
Who is the victim being threatened or humiliated?

post.title: August 21
post.body:
The searcher feels the need to create something better, while simultaneously pushing the bad away.
It never works.

post.title: August 20
post.body: There may be a mind that perceives, but it is not yours at all.

post.title: August 19
post.body:
Start with you.
Your own words. Your own thoughts.
It is all right there for you to see.

post.title: August 18
post.body: Questioning is not a reaction based on belief.

post.title: August 17
post.body:
Compassion is natural.
Why is it you need to be taught anything about it?

post.title: August 16
post.body: Is the self in any way capable of sensitivity?

post.title: August 15
post.body: Can you cast aside everything and see belief for what it is?

post.title: August 14
post.body:
A word is just a sound.
And this sound, if it is to be interpreted, needs an interpreter.

post.title: August 13
post.body: There is nothing seen, and no one is seeing it.

post.title: August 12
post.body:
Consciousness contains the memories, experiences, thoughts, and other mental constructs of the mind.
What else is there?

post.title: August 11
post.body:
If you must live in a world of thought, at least go about it in a way that is pleasant for everyone.
Live in a way that is beneficial for all human beings.

post.title: August 10
post.body: The individual is limited by the walls of its own design.

post.title: August 9
post.body:
Without attachment, thoughts are seen as a beautiful movement.
The ebb and flow of thought is wonderful to behold.

post.title: August 8
post.body:
If thought were truly aware of itself, it would only be aware within its own limited field.
It can only relate to itself through what it already knows.
Nothing new springs forth.

post.title: August 7
post.body: Meditation never ends. The cushion is not necessary.

post.title: August 6
post.body: If you say you are there, if you know you are there, if you believe you are there, you are lost.

post.title: August 5
post.body:
Your idea of a person freezes out any chance of seeing them as they actually are.
You’ll only see your image of the person, and never the real thing.

post.title: August 4
post.body: Violence is not the nature of man; it is the nature of thought.

post.title: August 3
post.body:
Everything is new at every moment.
Memory stays put, arising only when necessary.

post.title: August 2
post.body:
Please slow down.
Take a deep breath.
Repeat.

post.title: August 1
post.body: All of your effort to be free strengthens the shackles of confinement.

post.title: August
post.body: ![August](data/img/august.jpg "August")

post.title: July 31
post.body:
One would not ‘let go’ unless they felt something was wrong in the first place.
But there is absolutely nothing wrong with you.
You lack nothing.

post.title: July 30
post.body:
The self perceives the outer world as separate; something that is over there while I am over here.
But what is really happening?

post.title: July 29
post.body: How can anyone be angry at a sound?

post.title: July 28
post.body:
If there is a path, it will be one of your own exploration, devoid of all interference apart from your own activity.
In that place, there is every possibility, and it is not limited by what you accept or believe to be true.

post.title: July 27
post.body:
Anger helps to solidify the self.
You never feel more real than when you are angry.
It weighs heavy in the mind.

post.title: July 26
post.body: You see the search as futile, but at the same time, you think you need it in order to gain something.

post.title: July 25
post.body:
Find out now.
Everything is at stake.

post.title: July 24
post.body: Question your own statements.

post.title: July 23
post.body:
If someone is hateful to you, or if you have been insulted, you may feel some kind of pain.
But who is being hurt?

post.title: July 22
post.body:
There are no other people. No one to bring you hurt, no one to leave a scar.
If one hurts you with a word, where does it leave its mark?

post.title: July 21
post.body: You see the fact, ugly or not, and that is the truth that sets one free, not looking for something better.

post.title: July 20
post.body: When belief rises to answer the question, question the belief that rises.

post.title: July 19
post.body:
You must see with your own eyes.
It is the only way.

post.title: July 18
post.body: It takes some strength for the self to come up against what it believes to be true.

post.title: July 17
post.body:
When compassion seethes through every pore on your body, the idea of being compassionate will escape you.
You will move, and compassion will be there.
And that is all.

post.title: July 16
post.body: If one’s mind is separate, broken, and incapable of operating clearly, can that mind know what it means to be compassionate?

post.title: July 15
post.body:
It is fulfilling and meaningful to see the person; to be there with them as being unfolds.
It is a moment frozen in time, as the past falls away.
But due to the nature of being, there is no moment to be frozen.
It can only exist as a monument in our memories.

post.title: July 14
post.body: Why do you place such value on your perceptions?

post.title: July 13
post.body:
Contemplation means, the act of looking.
But when the self looks, it does not actually see; it only interprets from what it already knows.

post.title: July 12
post.body:
If a cat comes into the room and you see it, you might say that you are aware of the cat.
But what happens if the cat is seen, but there is no one there to be aware of anything?

post.title: July 11
post.body:
There is no possible way to know enlightenment.
Once thought has solidified something in order to better control and understand it, the thing is dead.

post.title: July 10
post.body: We disconnect from oneness, thinking we will have security, only to want to go back to nothingness because there is no security.

post.title: July 9
post.body:
The energy of liberation is massive. It bursts through the room and reaches out into infinity.
As one sits in the chair, aliveness seems to pulse, like a metronome that counts in waves, not in beats.
This energy engulfs all. It is the purest essence of life.

post.title: July 8
post.body:
It is an awareness of the whole movement of thought.
This is an altogether different kind of functioning.

post.title: July 7
post.body:
When you sit in order to see, you must go slowly.
Don’t instantly fall back on what you already know and have memorized.
Leave space for the meaning to become apparent without your effort.

post.title: July 6
post.body:
The question you might want to explore:
“Is it possible to be completely present with every single human being I come into contact with?”
Find out.

post.title: July 5
post.body:
You might think you can only have a relationship with someone you know…
…someone known to you through your memories of them.
If that is how you perceive things, it is quite possible that you have never related with anything.

post.title: July 4
post.body:
You are nature.
And naturalness is the nature of nature.

post.title: July 3
post.body:
One must be truly alone to discover whatever lies inside.
One must set everything aside, for perhaps the very first time, and travel alone.

post.title: July 2
post.body:
You will live until you die.
The beginning and ending is certain.
But what will you do with the long middle act?

post.title: July 1
post.body:
When sitting with nature, do not look for answers.
Look with nature and share in all of these parallel movements.

post.title: July
post.body: ![July](data/img/july.jpg "July")

post.title: June 30
post.body:
None of us knows what will happen.
One can only sit with oneself and see how it all unfurls.

post.title: June 29
post.body:
It is a very clean and clear movement bringing peace in its wake.
There is no evil that can stand against it.

post.title: June 28
post.body: To even approach this will require all of your attention and energy.

post.title: June 27
post.body:
If someone insults you, and you become angry, do you ever ask Why am I angry?
It is such a simple question, but no one ever asks.

post.title: June 26
post.body:
You have seen it clearly.
Now what do you do?

post.title: June 25
post.body: Taking a single step is going too far.

post.title: June 24
post.body: Be prepared to take it to the end. Do not be too timid in your explorations.

post.title: June 23
post.body: No one can give it to you.

post.title: June 22
post.body: Words will always be imperfect, but we do the best we can with what we have.

post.title: June 21
post.body: The room stays the same, no matter how colourful the new curtains are.

post.title: June 20
post.body:
Don't move!
It is there, right in front of you.

post.title: June 19
post.body: There is no NOW.

post.title: June 18
post.body:
Too much energy is spent on resisting or countering everything that comes into view.
No amount of pushing will ever clear one’s mind or ease one’s suffering.

post.title: June 17
post.body:
You…
…are not.

post.title: June 16
post.body:
Self-Development.
LOL…

post.title: June 15
post.body:
Be.
There is nothing else.

post.title: June 14
post.body: Sit with whatever it happens to be.

post.title: June 13
post.body: What is it that contemplates?

post.title: June 12
post.body: If you think you know it, you are mistaken.

post.title: June 11
post.body:
Enlightenment – if we can use that word – is beyond thought.
It is alive-ness that is beyond what we have known.

post.title: June 10
post.body: Nothing more and nothing less.

post.title: June 9
post.body:
It may seem blinding or frenetic or smoggy, but it is the height of love and beauty.
